faq.question: What spec version does OpenEJB support?

answer.p: OpenEJB supports the Enterprise JavaBeans 1.1 specification.

Local interfaces are part of the EJB 2.0 spec, which we do not yet support. However, we do have all the local interface capabilities in place.
